summary: This mod unlocks the wood chopping block for an infinte number of uses. This modifies the script itself so it will work on all blocks in Skyrim and will also be used by all NPCs
descriptionHtml:
Unlimited Woodwork and Mining â€” [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/2389?]Skyrim Special Edition version here.[/url]

[b]V1.2 update[/b]
Reworked the script into a complete loop. Much more efficient method used.
Reintroduced ore mining. Both wood chopping and mining can run forever.

This mod unlocks the wood chopping blocks and ore veins for an infinte number of uses. This modifies the script itself so it will work on all blocks in Skyrim and will also be used by all NPCs.
It works on all blocks and ore veins in the game, including the Dragonborn and Hearthfire deposits.

Credits:
BigMill and anyone else who tried this before me.
Jduvall at Bethesda who wrote the scripts.
author: PG1

files.name: Unlimited Woodwork and Mining
files.changelogHtml:
Fixed the counter so it's now completly infinite
Reintroduced infinite mining without the stability issues
